channel.title: Need help setting up vps!
channel.description:
I attemped this on my own so here are my questions:
hostname: _ (format: yourdomain.com or name.yourdomain.com) ** what do i put here i dont want to like make a website or anything >.<
Custom Setup Requirements: _ ** no idea :(
im using burst.net and what about these (should i leave them as they already are except os i want ubuntu): Configurable Options OS Template: Control Panel: IP Addresses (Base Allocation): External Backup Storage - (FTP/SSH/RSYNC/VPN/MAPPED): Fully Managed Service - (Phone Support, Multi-Port Monitoring, 3rd Party Script Basic Assistance, Limited Free O/S Re-installs): CPanel/WHM Add-On - Fantastico - (Script & Open-Source Software Auto-Installer): CPanel/DirectAdmin/Plesk(Linux) Add-On - Softaculous - (Script & Open-Source Software Auto-Installer): Plesk Add-On - Power Pack - (Bundle of SpamAssassin, Application Pack, Helpdesk, PostgreSQL/MSSQL, Tomcat, & ColdFusion Add-Ons): Plesk Add-On - Language Pack - Additional Language:

item.title: Need help setting up vps!
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I attemped this on my own so here are my questions:

hostname: _ (format: yourdomain.com or name.yourdomain.com) ** what do i put here i dont want to like make a website or anything >.<

Custom Setup Requirements: _ ** no idea

im using burst.net and what about these (should i leave them as they already are except os i want ubuntu):
Configurable Options
OS Template:
Control Panel:
IP Addresses (Base Allocation):
External Backup Storage - (FTP/SSH/RSYNC/VPN/MAPPED):
Fully Managed Service - (Phone Support, Multi-Port Monitoring, 3rd Party Script Basic Assistance, Limited Free O/S Re-installs):
CPanel/WHM Add-On - Fantastico - (Script & Open-Source Software Auto-Installer):

Plesk Add-On - Power Pack - (Bundle of SpamAssassin, Application Pack, Helpdesk, PostgreSQL/MSSQL, Tomcat, & ColdFusion Add-Ons):
Plesk Add-On - Language Pack - Additional Language:
